about_the_game:
■Genre.
Love Novel ADV

■Play time.
1 to 2 hours

■Number of EDs 4
4
The dialogue and visuals change slightly depending on the choices made in certain events, although they do not affect the EDs.

----
■Synopsis.

I wanted to fall in love, too.

A boy with good looks falls in "love" with an unusual girl who has romantic feelings for a stone.
In order to protect her, he almost caused a serious accident in that classroom at that time.

After receiving his confession, the girl begins to question her own "love" for the stone.
And the two began to worry.

Is this feeling really ...... love?

Certainly, there is a throbbing in the chest.
The cold sweat and the shuddering sensation are both real.

They tell each other how they feel, break up, and sometimes secretly mingle with each other.
This is a story of two people lost in their first "love".

content_descriptors.notes:
・The story contains descriptions of interpersonal sexuality (mainly heterosexual) and object sexuality. Contains statements by some characters that do not accept the romantic views of others. (Main theme)
・The film contains romantic scenes involving confessions and hugs between minors. It also contains some non-consensual hugging.(Main theme)
・Fights between minors may result in injuries requiring immobilization in a cast. There is no bloodshed. (text only).
・Some of the books in the game contain sexual language. There are depictions of minors reading the book. (Text only)
・Contains some conversations between minors that allude to "sexual words for procreation". (text only)

name: 無垢を裂く

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Storage: 380 MB available space

short_description: A novel game about experiencing first love that begins in the rainy season.
